DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of KDX-0811(Dexrazoxane) in the treatment of accidental extravasation of anthracycline anti-cancer agents.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I/II Study of KDX-0811(Dexrazoxane) in the Treatment of Accidental Extravasation of Anthracycline Anti-cancer Agents
DOC.criteria: Patients suspected to have been exposed to extravasation of anthracycline Patients reasonably suspected to have been exposed to extravasation by other compounds than anthracyclines through the same IV access, e.g. vincristine, mitomycin, and vinorelbine, all of which may cause ulceration
